about_the_game:
Arijigoku is a 2d, pixel art point and click adventure/horror game where you control Erik. Like  the classic adventure games, you need to find and use various items to progress the story and solve puzzles. By interacting with the environment using the two click style (left click to INTERACT, right click to LOOK), you will learn more about Erik's past and what is happening in this secluded forest. Be careful and save often though, you can die if you make the wrong decisions!

NOTE: The game has a full, interactive tutorial accessible from the main menu. 

STORY DESCRIPTION: 

Erik is a man searching for purpose. Having recently lost his daughter and wife, he hits a breaking point and goes out driving. Anywhere, as long as it is somewhere else. When his car breaks down on a stretch of rural, Northern Ontario highway, he looks for help up a nearby dirt path, not knowing his life is about to change forever.

content_descriptors.notes: Game deals with loss of a child and spouse, has mild pixel gore, and accidental death.
